member.name: SAMPR_ENCRYPTED_USER_PASSWORD
member.summary: The SAMPR_ENCRYPTED_USER_PASSWORD stores a user's encrypted password.

member.name: SAMPR_ENCRYPTED_USER_PASSWORD.Buffer
member.summary: An array contains an encrypted password. The contents of the array are calculated using either the NewPasswordEncryptedWithOldNtPasswordHash or NewPasswordEncryptedWithOldLmPasswordHash functions as defined in RFC 2433, sections A.11 and A.15 respectively.
